text.autoconfig.smoke_suppression.title: Smoke Suppression Configuration
text.autoconfig.smoke_suppression.option:
List of blocks that will suppress the
smoke of any campfire placed above them.

§lExisting campfires must be re-placed
or re-loaded to reflect config changes

Suppress smoke particles regardless of
which block is beneath a campfire.

§lExisting campfires must be re-placed
or re-loaded to reflect config changes
